verses.verse: נַחֲמ֥וּ <S%H5162><s%> Comfort נַחֲמ֖וּ <S%H5162><s%> ye comfort עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> ye my people יֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

דַּבְּר֞וּ <S%H1696><s%> Speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> ye comfortably יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וְקִרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> and cry אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> about כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מָֽלְאָה֙ <S%H4390><s%> is accomplished צְבָאָ֔הּ <S%H6635><s%> unto her that her warfare כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִרְצָ֖ה <S%H7521><s%> is pardoned עֲוֹנָ֑הּ <S%H5771><s%> that her iniquity כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לָקְחָה֙ <S%H3947><s%> for she hath received מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God כִּפְלַ֖יִם <S%H3718><s%> double בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חַטֹּאתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H2403><s%> for all her sins ס

ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice קוֹרֵ֔א <S%H7121><s%> of him that crieth בַּמִּדְבָּ֕ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness פַּנּ֖וּ <S%H6437><s%> Prepare דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> ye the way יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יַשְּׁרוּ֙ <S%H3474><s%> make straight בָּעֲרָבָ֔ה <S%H6160><s%> in the desert מְסִלָּ֖ה <S%H4546><s%> a highway לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> for our God

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גֶּיא֙ <S%H1516><s%> Every valley יִנָּשֵׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> shall be exalted וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> and every mountain וְגִבְעָ֖ה <S%H1389><s%> and hill יִשְׁפָּ֑לוּ <S%H8213><s%> shall be made low וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become הֶֽעָקֹב֙ <S%H6121><s%> and the crooked לְמִישׁ֔וֹר <S%H4334><s%> shall be made straight וְהָרְכָסִ֖ים <S%H7406><s%> and the rough places לְבִקְעָֽה׃ <S%H1237><s%> plain

וְנִגְלָ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> shall be revealed כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> And the glory יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְרָא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בָּשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> and all flesh יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> [it] together כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> for the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken ס

ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice אֹמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said קְרָ֔א <S%H7121><s%> Cry וְאָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> What shall I cry כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַבָּשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> ? All flesh חָצִ֔יר <S%H2682><s%> [is] grass וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חַסְדּ֖וֹ <S%H2617><s%> and all the goodliness כְּצִ֥יץ <S%H6731><s%> thereof [is] as the flower הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

יָבֵ֤שׁ <S%H3001><s%> withereth חָצִיר֙ <S%H2682><s%> The grass נָ֣בֵֽל <S%H5034><s%> fadeth צִ֔יץ <S%H6731><s%> the flower כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> When ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> because the spirit יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נָ֣שְׁבָה <S%H5380><s%> bloweth בּ֑וֹ אָכֵ֥ן <S%H403><s%> upon it surely חָצִ֖יר <S%H2682><s%> [is] grass הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

יָבֵ֥שׁ <S%H3001><s%> withereth חָצִ֖יר <S%H2682><s%> The grass נָ֣בֵֽל <S%H5034><s%> fadeth צִ֑יץ <S%H6731><s%> the flower וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> but the word אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God יָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall stand לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever ס

עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain גָּבֹ֤הַ <S%H1364><s%> into the high עֲלִי־ <S%H5927><s%> get thee up לָךְ֙ מְבַשֶּׂ֣רֶת <S%H1319><s%> that bringest good tidings צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> O Zion הָרִ֤ימִי <S%H7311><s%> lift up בַכֹּ֙חַ֙ <S%H3581><s%> with strength קוֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice מְבַשֶּׂ֖רֶת <S%H1319><s%> that bringest good tidings יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem הָרִ֙ימִי֙ <S%H7311><s%> lift [it] up אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֔אִי <S%H3372><s%> be not afraid אִמְרִי֙ <S%H559><s%> say לְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> unto the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> Here אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> Behold your God

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> Behold the Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD בְּחָזָ֣ק <S%H2389><s%> with strong יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> will come וּזְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> [hand] and his arm מֹ֣שְׁלָה <S%H4910><s%> shall rule ל֑וֹ הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שְׂכָרוֹ֙ <S%H7939><s%> for him behold his reward אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וּפְעֻלָּת֖וֹ <S%H6468><s%> [is] with him and his work לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

כְּרֹעֶה֙ <S%H7462><s%> He shall feed עֶדְר֣וֹ <S%H5739><s%> his flock יִרְעֶ֔ה <S%H7462><s%> like a shepherd בִּזְרֹעוֹ֙ <S%H2220><s%> with his arm יְקַבֵּ֣ץ <S%H6908><s%> he shall gather טְלָאִ֔ים <S%H2922><s%> the lambs וּבְחֵיק֖וֹ <S%H2436><s%> [them] in his bosom יִשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> and carry עָל֖וֹת <S%H5763><s%> those that are with young יְנַהֵֽל׃ <S%H5095><s%> [and] shall gently lead ס

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who מָדַ֨ד <S%H4058><s%> Who hath measured בְּשָׁעֳל֜וֹ <S%H8168><s%> in the hollow of his hand מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters וְשָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> heaven בַּזֶּ֣רֶת <S%H2239><s%> with the span תִּכֵּ֔ן <S%H8505><s%> and meted out וְכָ֥ל <S%H3557><s%> and comprehended בַּשָּׁלִ֖שׁ <S%H7991><s%> in a measure עֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְשָׁקַ֤ל <S%H8254><s%> and weighed בַּפֶּ֙לֶס֙ <S%H6425><s%> in scales הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> the mountains וּגְבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and the hills בְּמֹאזְנָֽיִם׃ <S%H3976><s%> pair of scales

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who תִכֵּ֥ן <S%H8505><s%> Who hath directed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the Spirit יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he עֲצָת֖וֹ <S%H6098><s%> advice יוֹדִיעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> hath taught

אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> With מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> whom נוֹעָץ֙ <S%H3289><s%> With whom took he counsel וַיְבִינֵ֔הוּ <S%H995><s%> and [who] instructed וַֽיְלַמְּדֵ֖הוּ <S%H3925><s%> him and taught בְּאֹ֣רַח <S%H734><s%> him in the path מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> of judgment וַיְלַמְּדֵ֣הוּ <S%H3925><s%> and taught דַ֔עַת <S%H1847><s%> him knowledge וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> to him the way תְּבוּנ֖וֹת <S%H8394><s%> fruit יוֹדִיעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> and shewed

הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold גּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> Behold the nations כְּמַ֣ר <S%H4752><s%> [are] as a drop מִדְּלִ֔י <S%H1805><s%> of a bucket וּכְשַׁ֥חַק <S%H7834><s%> as the small dust מֹאזְנַ֖יִם <S%H3976><s%> of the balance נֶחְשָׁ֑בוּ <S%H2803><s%> and are counted הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold אִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> the isles כַּדַּ֥ק <S%H1851><s%> as a very little thing יִטּֽוֹל׃ <S%H5190><s%> behold he taketh up

וּלְבָנ֕וֹן <S%H3844><s%> And Lebanon אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> [is] not דֵּ֖י <S%H1767><s%> sufficient בָּעֵ֑ר <S%H1197><s%> to burn וְחַיָּת֔וֹ <S%H2416><s%> nor the beasts אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> Nor דֵּ֖י <S%H1767><s%> thereof sufficient עוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering ס

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> All nations כְּאַ֣יִן <S%H369><s%> nothing נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5048><s%> before מֵאֶ֥פֶס <S%H657><s%> to him less than nothing וָתֹ֖הוּ <S%H8414><s%> and vanity נֶחְשְׁבוּ־ <S%H2803><s%> before him [are] as nothing and they are counted לֽוֹ׃

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> whom תְּדַמְּי֣וּן <S%H1819><s%> To whom then will ye liken אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> God וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long דְּמ֖וּת <S%H1823><s%> likeness תַּ֥עַרְכוּ <S%H6186><s%> will ye compare לֽוֹ׃

הַפֶּ֙סֶל֙ <S%H6459><s%> a graven image נָסַ֣ךְ <S%H5258><s%> melteth חָרָ֔שׁ <S%H2796><s%> The workman וְצֹרֵ֖ף <S%H6884><s%> and the goldsmith בַּזָּהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> it over with gold יְרַקְּעֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7554><s%> spreadeth וּרְתֻק֥וֹת <S%H7577><s%> chains כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver צוֹרֵֽף׃ <S%H6884><s%> and casteth

הַֽמְסֻכָּ֣ן <S%H5533><s%> endanger תְּרוּמָ֔ה <S%H8641><s%> that he hath no oblation עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> a tree לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִרְקַ֖ב <S%H7537><s%> [that] will not rot יִבְחָ֑ר <S%H977><s%> chooseth חָרָ֤שׁ <S%H2796><s%> workman חָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> unto him a cunning יְבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> he seeketh ל֔וֹ לְהָכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> to prepare פֶּ֖סֶל <S%H6459><s%> a graven image לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> [that] shall not be moved

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תֵֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> Have ye not known הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמָ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> ? have ye not heard הֲל֛וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not הֻגַּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> ? hath it not been told מֵרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> band לָכֶ֑ם הֲלוֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> not הֲבִ֣ינֹתֶ֔ם <S%H995><s%> attend מוֹסְד֖וֹת <S%H4146><s%> from the foundations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> who

הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> [It is] he that sitteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above ח֣וּג <S%H2329><s%> upon the circle הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants כַּחֲגָבִ֑ים <S%H2284><s%> thereof [are] as grasshoppers הַנּוֹטֶ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> that stretcheth out כַדֹּק֙ <S%H1852><s%> as a curtain שָׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens וַיִּמְתָּחֵ֥ם <S%H4969><s%> and spreadeth them out כָּאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> as a tent לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H3427><s%> to dwell in

הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> That bringeth רוֹזְנִ֖ים <S%H7336><s%> the princes לְאָ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> to nothing שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <S%H8199><s%> the judges אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth כַּתֹּ֥הוּ <S%H8414><s%> as vanity עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> to nothing he maketh

אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> yet בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest נִטָּ֗עוּ <S%H5193><s%> Yea they shall not be planted אַ֚ף <S%H637><s%> yet בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest זֹרָ֔עוּ <S%H2232><s%> yea they shall not be sown אַ֛ף <S%H637><s%> yet בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest שֹׁרֵ֥שׁ <S%H8327><s%> shall not take root בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth גִּזְעָ֑ם <S%H1503><s%> yea their stock וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> merely נָשַׁ֤ף <S%H5398><s%> and he shall also blow בָּהֶם֙ וַיִּבָ֔שׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> upon them and they shall wither וּסְעָרָ֖ה <S%H5591><s%> and the whirlwind כַּקַּ֥שׁ <S%H7179><s%> them away as stubble תִּשָּׂאֵֽם׃ <S%H5375><s%> shall take ס

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> whom תְדַמְּי֖וּנִי <S%H1819><s%> To whom then will ye liken וְאֶשְׁוֶ֑ה <S%H7737><s%> me or shall I be equal יֹאמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> ? saith קָדֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One
